Structs/HAResponseEventStateChanged.html.abstract: The old state of the entity, if there was one

Structs/HAResponseEventStateChanged.html.name: newState

Structs/HAResponseEvent.html#/s:11HAWebS.name: context
Structs/HAResponseEvent.html#/s:11HAWebS.abstract: The context of the event, e.g. who executed it

Structs/HAEventType.html#/s:11HAWebSocke.abstract: Create a type instance via a nil literal, representing all events

Structs/HAResponseCurrentUser/MFAModule..abstract: Whether the given module is enabled for the user

Structs/HAResponseCurrentUser/Credential.abstract: The type of the credential, for example homeassistant

Structs/HAResponseCurrentUser/Credential.abstract: The id of the credential, specific to that credential

Structs/HAResponseCurrentUser/Credential.abstract: Create with a given type and id

Structs/HAResponseCurrentUser.html#/s:11.abstract: The ID of the user; this is a long hex string

Protocols/HACancellable.html#/s:11HAWebS.abstract: Cancel the request or subscription represented by this.

Protocols/HAConnectionProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Start a subscription to a request with a concrete event type

Protocols/HAConnectionProtocol.html#/s:1.name: subscribe(to:initiated:handler:)
Protocols/HAConnectionProtocol.html#/s:1.abstract: Start a subscription to a request with a concrete event type

Protocols/HADecodeTransformable.html.abstract: Decode a value by massagging into another type

Enums/HAError.html#/s:11HAWebSocket7HAEr.abstract: An error occurred in parsing or other internal handling

Enums/HAError.html#/s:11HAWebSocket7HAEr.abstract: An error response from the server indicating a request problem

Enums/HAError.html#/s:11HAWebSocket7HAEr.abstract: A description of the error, see LocalizedError or access via localizedDescription

Enums/HAConnection.html#/s:11HAWebSocket.abstract: The type which represents an API connection
